select.id: select利用者負担額減額リストBy主キー1
select利用者負担額減額情報By被保険者番号

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei" ON rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" and rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."hihokenshaNo" and rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."rirekiNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."shinseiRirekiNo" AND rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."gemmenGengakuShurui" = #{減免減額種類} WHERE rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} ORDER BY rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."tekiyoKaishiYMD" DESC,rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."ketteiKubun"

select.id: selectBy被保険者番号And減免減額種類

mapper.select:
SELECT ,
FROM rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku" LEFT JOIN rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei" ON rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" and rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."hihokenshaNo" and rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."rirekiNo" = rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."shinseiRirekiNo" WHERE rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND (rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."gemmenGengakuShurui" = #{減免減額種類} OR rgdb."DbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei"."gemmenGengakuShurui" IS NULL) ORDER BY rgdb."DbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku"."shinseiYMD" DESC

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM () AS A LEFT JOIN () AS B ON A."dbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shoKisaiHokenshaNo" AND A."dbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku_hihokenshaNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_hihokenshaNo" AND A."dbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku_rirekiNo" = B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_shinseiRirekiNo" AND B."dbT4010GemmenGengakuShinsei_gemmenGengakuShurui" = #{減免減額種類} WHERE A."dbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku_hihokenshaNo" = #{被保険者番号} AND A."dbT4014RiyoshaFutangakuGengaku_rirekiNo" = #{履歴番号}
